name: Bloomberry - match 3 puzzle
description:
Welcome to Bloomberry puzzles game! Decorate house, garden, see how your pet grows, match puzzles and have fun.

Download Bloomberry game for Fun, Exciting Gameplay:
Match berries & decorate your pet’s mansion – incredible boosters & power-up combos!
Piece together hidden objects, interact with in-game characters & reveal the hidden story!
Unlock hidden areas & thousands of DIY decorations!

Hone your interior design skills. Follow the adventure story, unlock new houses and discover hidden secrets – all with a cast of quirky characters in tow. You can even spy on your neighbors and see how their design choices stack up. Are you ready to navigate this challenging match-3 puzzle?

Features:
- Unique gameplay: make match-3 combinations with berries, decorate houses and garden and enjoy a fun story – and all in one place!
- Hundreds of original match-3 levels and puzzles.
- Complete mini-quests and other challenges that the Fairy has for you.
- Take care of your pet, feed it lollipops, fruit, pastries, candies and other tasty dishes, and sometimes tuck it in to sleep.
- Decorate the garden with flowers and beautiful butterflies will come to see you.
- Assemble collections of gnomes and kittens.
- Cute characters that can become your friends – meet them all!
- Connect to Facebook: visit your friends’ houses and give them gifts.
- Clearings in different styles: Herbalist, Fisherman, Buddhist and many more.
- Lots of beautiful decorations: an aquarium of fish, statues and more.
- Your charming friend Bloom who is always glad to see you.

Bloomberry is a FREE TO PLAY, with optional in-game items for purchase.
You can play Bloomberry without an Internet connection.

The Bloomberry team sincerely hope that you like our new match-3 puzzle game! We are working very hard to perfecting it, so If you run into any issues while playing or you have any suggestions, please don’t hesitate to reach out to us at support@skywaylab.com.
